name: Big Dipper
entries: This heavy-duty fishing rod is a magic weapon only suited for the most enthusiastic of fishermen. While you are attuned to this weapon, you have the following benefits.
You can cast the following spells without providing material components:

items: {@spell locate animals or plants|PHB} within an aquatic environment (3/day)
{@spell dominate beast|PHB} (save DC 15) on a beast with an innate swim speed (1/day)

entries: When you take the Attack action and attack with this weapon on your turn, you can replace one of your attacks with a cast of the Big Dipper's hook. The hook targets another creature of your choice, your size or smaller, within 40 feet. An unwilling creature must make a DC 15 strength saving throw to resist being moved; otherwise, hooked creatures can be moved up to 10 feet in any direction. The hook detaches from a creature at the end of your turn.
Proficiency with a quarterstaff allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.
